data.name: PageProperties
desc: describes the style of pages.
**since**
LibreOffice 6.1

properties.name: BackColor
desc: contains the background color of the page.

properties.name: BackGraphic
desc: contains the graphic of the background.
**since**
LibreOffice 6.1

properties.name: BackGraphicFilter
desc: contains the filter name of the background graphic.

properties.name: BackGraphicLocation
desc: determines the location of the background graphic.

properties.name: BackGraphicURL
desc: contains the URL of the background graphic.

Note the new behaviour since it this was deprecated: This property can only be set and only external URLs are supported (no more vnd.sun.star.GraphicObject scheme). When an URL is set, then it will load the graphic and set the BackGraphic property.

properties.name: BackTransparent
desc: determines if the background color is transparent.
If this property is set to TRUE, PageStyle.BackColor will not be used.

properties.name: BackgroundFullSize
desc: does the background cover the full page or only inside the margins?
**since**
LibreOffice 7.2

properties.name: BorderDistance
desc: determines the distance of all borders of the page.

properties.name: BottomBorder
desc: determines the style of the bottom border line of the page.

properties.name: BottomBorderDistance
desc: determines the bottom border distance of the page.

properties.name: BottomMargin
desc: determines the bottom margin of the page.

properties.name: FirstIsShared
desc: determines if the header/footer content on the first page and remaining pages is the same.
**since**
LibreOffice 4.0

properties.name: FooterBackColor
desc: contains the color of the background of the footer.

properties.name: FooterBackGraphic
desc: contains the graphic of the background of the footer.
**since**
LibreOffice 6.1

properties.name: FooterBackGraphicFilter
desc: contains the filter name of the background graphic in the footer.

properties.name: FooterBackGraphicLocation
desc: determines the location of the background graphic in the footer.

properties.name: FooterBackGraphicURL
desc: contains the URL of the background graphic in the footer.

Note the new behaviour since it this was deprecated: This property can only be set and only external URLs are supported (no more vnd.sun.star.GraphicObject scheme). When an URL is set, then it will load the graphic and set the FooterBackGraphic property.

properties.name: FooterBackTransparent
desc: determines if the background of the footer is transparent.

properties.name: FooterBodyDistance
desc: determines the distance between the footer and the body text area.

properties.name: FooterBorderDistance
desc: contains the distance of all borders of the footer.

properties.name: FooterBottomBorder
desc: contains the style of the bottom border line of the footer.

properties.name: FooterBottomBorderDistance
desc: contains the bottom border distance of the footer.

properties.name: FooterDynamicSpacing
desc: determines whether to use dynamic spacing in footer or not.

properties.name: FooterHeight
desc: determines the height of the footer.

properties.name: FooterIsDynamicHeight
desc: determines if the height of the footer depends on the content.

properties.name: FooterIsOn
desc: determines if a footer is used on the page.

properties.name: FooterIsShared
desc: determines if the footer content on left and right pages is the same.

properties.name: FooterLeftBorder
desc: contains the style of the left border line of the footer.

properties.name: FooterLeftBorderDistance
desc: contains the left border distance of the footer.

properties.name: FooterLeftMargin
desc: determines the left margin of the footer.

properties.name: FooterRightBorder
desc: contains the style of the right border line of the footer.

properties.name: FooterRightBorderDistance
desc: contains the right border distance of the footer.

properties.name: FooterRightMargin
desc: determines the right margin of the footer.

properties.name: FooterShadowFormat
desc: determines the shadow of the footer.

properties.name: FooterText
desc: contains the interface to the text of the footer.

properties.name: FooterTextLeft
desc: contains the interface to the text of the footer of a left page.

properties.name: FooterTextRight
desc: contains the interface to the text of the footer of a right page.

properties.name: FooterTopBorder
desc: contains the style of the top border line of the footer.

properties.name: FooterTopBorderDistance
desc: contains the top border distance of the footer.

properties.name: FootnoteHeight
desc: contains the maximum height of the footnote area.
If set to zero then the height of the current page is used as limit.

properties.name: FootnoteLineAdjust
desc: contains the adjustment of the separator line between the text and the footnote area.
com.sun.star.text.HorizontalAdjusts.

properties.name: FootnoteLineColor
desc: contains the color of the separator line between the text and the footnote area.

properties.name: FootnoteLineDistance
desc: contains the distance between the footnote area and the separator line between the text and the footnote area.

properties.name: FootnoteLineRelativeWidth
desc: contains the relative width of the separator line between the text and the footnote area.

properties.name: FootnoteLineStyle
desc: contains the style of the separator line between the text and the footnote area.

properties.name: FootnoteLineTextDistance
desc: contains the distance between the text and the separator line between the text and the footnote area.

properties.name: FootnoteLineWeight
desc: contains the weight of the separator line between the text and the footnote area.

properties.name: GridBaseHeight
desc: contains the height of the base text line inside the text grid

properties.name: GridColor
desc: contains the display color of the text grid

properties.name: GridDisplay
desc: determines whether the text grid lines are visible or not

properties.name: GridLines
desc: contains the number of lines in the text grid

properties.name: GridMode
desc: contains the mode of the text grid (none, lines, ...), as represented by com.sun.star.text.TextGridMode constants

properties.name: GridPrint
desc: determines whether the text grid lines are printed

properties.name: GridRubyBelow
desc: determines whether the text grid's ruby line is located below or above the base line

properties.name: GridRubyHeight
desc: contains the height of the ruby text line inside the text grid

properties.name: GutterMargin
desc: determines the gutter margin of the page.
**since**
LibreOffice 7.2

properties.name: HeaderBackColor
desc: contains the color of the background of the header.

properties.name: HeaderBackGraphic
desc: contains the graphic of the background of the header.
**since**
LibreOffice 6.1

properties.name: HeaderBackGraphicFilter
desc: contains the filter name of the background graphic of the header.

properties.name: HeaderBackGraphicLocation
desc: determines the location of the background graphic of the header.

properties.name: HeaderBackGraphicURL
desc: contains the URL of the background graphic of the header.

Note the new behaviour since it this was deprecated: This property can only be set and only external URLs are supported (no more vnd.sun.star.GraphicObject scheme). When an URL is set, then it will load the graphic and set the HeaderBackGraphic property.

properties.name: HeaderBackTransparent
desc: determines if the background color of the header is transparent.
If this property is set to TRUE, PageStyle.HeaderBackColor will not be used.

properties.name: HeaderBodyDistance
desc: determines the distance between the header and the body text area.

properties.name: HeaderBorderDistance
desc: determines the distance of all borders of the header.

properties.name: HeaderBottomBorder
desc: determines the style of the bottom border line of the header.

properties.name: HeaderBottomBorderDistance
desc: determines the bottom border distance of the header.

properties.name: HeaderDynamicSpacing
desc: determines whether to use dynamic spacing in header or not.

properties.name: HeaderHeight
desc: contains the height of the header.

properties.name: HeaderIsDynamicHeight
desc: determines if the height of the header depends on the content.

properties.name: HeaderIsOn
desc: determines if a header is used on the page.

properties.name: HeaderIsShared
desc: determines if the header content on left and right pages is the same.

properties.name: HeaderLeftBorder
desc: determines the style of the left border line of the header.

properties.name: HeaderLeftBorderDistance
desc: determines the left border distance of the header.

properties.name: HeaderLeftMargin
desc: contains the left margin of the header.

properties.name: HeaderRightBorder
desc: determines the style of the right border line of the header.

properties.name: HeaderRightBorderDistance
desc: determines the right border distance of the header.

properties.name: HeaderRightMargin
desc: contains the right margin of the header.

properties.name: HeaderShadowFormat
desc: determines the shadow of the header.

properties.name: HeaderText
desc: contains the interface to the text of the header.

properties.name: HeaderTextLeft
desc: contains the interface to the text of the header of left pages.

properties.name: HeaderTextRight
desc: contains the interface to the text of the header of right pages.

properties.name: HeaderTopBorder
desc: determines the style of the top border line of the header.

properties.name: HeaderTopBorderDistance
desc: determines the top border distance of the header.

properties.name: Height
desc: contains the height of the page.

properties.name: IsLandscape
desc: determines if the page format is landscape.

properties.name: LeftBorder
desc: determines the style of the left border line of the page.

properties.name: LeftBorderDistance
desc: determines the left border distance of the page.

properties.name: LeftMargin
desc: determines the left margin of the page.

properties.name: NumberingType
desc: determines the default numbering type for this page.

properties.name: PageStyleLayout
desc: determines the layout of the page.

properties.name: PrinterPaperTray
desc: contains the name of a paper tray of the selected printer.

properties.name: RegisterModeActive
desc: determines if the register mode is active on that page.

properties.name: RegisterParagraphStyle
desc: contains the name of the paragraph style that is used as reference of the register mode.

properties.name: RightBorder
desc: determines the style of the right border line of the page.

properties.name: RightBorderDistance
desc: determines the right border distance of the page.

properties.name: RightMargin
desc: determines the right margin of the page.

properties.name: RtlGutter
desc: specifies that the page gutter shall be placed on the right side of the page.
**since**
LibreOffice 7.2

properties.name: ShadowFormat
desc: determines the shadow of the page.

properties.name: Size
desc: contains the paper size of the page.

properties.name: TextColumns
desc: contains the column settings of the page.

properties.name: TopBorder
desc: determines the style of the top border line of the page.

properties.name: TopBorderDistance
desc: determines the top border distance of the page.

properties.name: TopMargin
desc: determines the top margin of the page.

properties.name: UserDefinedAttributes
desc: contains user defined attributes.
This com.sun.star.container.XNameContainer supports the service com.sun.star.xml.AttributeContainer.

properties.name: Width
desc: contains the width of the page.

properties.name: WritingMode
desc: contains the writing direction, as represented by the com.sun.star.text.WritingMode2 constants
